Author: n0kikin0ki
Text: 100% water weight. this is why i NEVER weigh myself after a binge because i know it will just trigger me. try to wait at least 2 days before weighing after a binge and drink a lot of water to clear out any water retention from sodium.

Author: jeykehey
Text: thats gotta be water weight my friend. try to take it easy for the next couple days and eat as close to maintenance as you can to let your body get its shit back together. take care of yourself <3
